meanings.definition: A group of bacteria commonly found in soil.
meanings.sent1: Streptomycetes are tiny organisms living in the dirt.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on streptomycetes to help enrich the soil.
meanings.sent3: The streptomycetes in the garden had a little party underground.
meanings.sent4: The streptomycetes worked together like a bustling city in the soil.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the streptomycetes looked like a bustling community.

meanings.definition: Any of various bacteria of the genus Streptomyces, some of which produce antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study streptomycetes to find new medicines.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use antibiotics made by streptomycetes to treat infections.
meanings.sent3: The streptomycetes in the lab were brewing up some powerful potions.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bacteria, streptomycetes are like the superheroes of medicine.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of penicillin by streptomycetes revolutionized healthcare.
